  • Method Details

    • addToDate

      public static Date addToDate(Date date, int num)
      add / subtract num to date and modify the initial date to receive a correct date.
      Parameters:
      date - : initial date
      num - number of days that we have to add.
      Returns:
      the calculated date.

    • changeYear

      public static boolean changeYear(Date date, int num)
      checks if we have to change the year.
      Parameters:
      date - the initial date
      num - the number of days that we want to add or subtract.
      Returns:
      true if we have to change the year, else return false.

    • checkLeapYear

      public static boolean checkLeapYear(Date date)
      checks if the year is a leap year.
      Parameters:
      date - the initial date
      Returns:
      true if the year is a leap year, else return false.

    • numberDays

      public static int numberDays(Date date)
      returns number of days of the month of a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - specific date.
      Returns:
      number of days of the month of a specific date.

    • reversePassTo

      public static int reversePassTo(Date date)
      returns the number of month of the precedent month of a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - the specific date.
      Returns:
      the number of month of the precedent month of a specific date.
